author: protolambda
content:
Tomorrow, after the Merge summit, I'll focus on test-running all clients, and preparing a deployment for the 1-day testnet next week.

We'll run the majority of the validators on the network on a stable deployment, split between all participating eth2 validator client types, so we can ensure there are nodes online to test against. We will share enough keys so everyone can test block-proposals, but not to break finality when going offline or when repeatedly restarting during testing. I do not expect all participants will be online all the time, but coordinating around genesis would be nice. Monday for genesis is probably too early, Tuesday can work (assuming participants can start a node or two on Monday, and connect to the main deployment/bootnodes).
